page.title: 05The children
page.content:
{CHILDREN WHO GO TO FELTON SCHOOL.
There are 63 children who come to our school. There are 3 classes and a nursery. Class 1 is for 17 first years,Class 2 is for 27 2nd and 3rd years. Class 3 is for 19 4th and 5th years. Most children come from Felton Village but some come from farms. 11 children come in the school taxi. It travels from the furthest farm,8.5km to the south. Felton is a long village along the old A1.Some village children walk or ride about 1.25km to school. 3 children travel 3km from the north by van, 2 travel about 5km from the west. The children who come to the nursery may come further as there are no other nursery classes near. 33 of the children have parents who also went to Felton School.
